attributes.action: We want Keith FC to be included in scorewars instead of the blatant ignoring.
attributes.additional_details: The powers that be keep ignoring our requests for their inclusion and we feel this is the only way to make people take notice.
attributes.background: To review the treatment of the much loved Scottish football side Keith FC and to mandate their inclusion in scorewars on a regular basis.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about Keith FC are a matter for The Scottish Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
